author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Update status to use the 1.5 API.
(status): Rename 'descend' argument to 'recurse', which is more consistent
(status): Use SVN_DEPTH_FROM_RECURSE() to update to svn_client_status3().
Simplify the call by removing ?: constructs.
